morning.title: Morning Permission
rules: Submit the permission request at least <1>two hours before</1> the requested time.
If the scheduled permission time passes without usage, it will be <1>automatically rejected</1>.
After the permission ends, the employee must:
Clock in (register attendance) before the permission time ends.
Clocking in late will be considered a <1>late arrival</1>.

evening.title: Evening Permission
rules: Submit the request at least <1>two hours in advance</1>.
If the scheduled time passes without usage, it will be <1>automatically rejected</1>.
Clock out (register departure) before leaving the workplace.
Failure to clock out will be considered a <1>policy violation</1>.
